attributes.review: Does not work at all. Every time I have tried to look into it. Or use it. It freezes. Runs incredibly slow. When I do get through it it’s pretty repetitive and it seems to only like to use hand gestures and make weird noises with its mouth. Doesn’t ever really offer hard tax either.
attributes.title: Not helpful at all

attributes.review: This app took like 3 hours to download and while it was downloading it I couldn’t even use my phone. When I opened it, it welcomed me with a message that said: “welcome you useless big fat rat”. It really hurt my feelings. And not only that but it gave my location to some roaches and they ate my bed. Now I have to sleep on the floor. Thanks trump.
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: This app was extremely unprofessional very hard to use and is following a very hard idea (person) to stand under
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: This app is so bad I can’t even begin to start I thought this was a game where your an orange but I found it’s actually a person j could barley tell the difference we’ll now I’m disappointed no more orange game then so I give this a one star I wish you where a fruit and have to survive the humans but instead you just see a human☹️
attributes.title: Worst orange game ever

attributes.review: the programming on this app is inappropriate and completely scarring people of all ages. i go to open the app to be surprised, there’s an orange with a face and nasty yellow hair! it caused nightmares for weeks, and having the feel to bleach my eyes and forget what i saw. DO NOT DOWNLOAD! this app leaves terrible trauma and i am deleting it this instant. GEN Z DOESN’T GO DOWN WITHOUT A FIGHT 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻✨✨
attributes.title: this app is disgusting! do not recommend.

attributes.review:
hello. i am appalled to tell you that this app just does not work for me. i am a 52 yr old trump lovin hard workin house wife, but i went to go on this app and the first thing that popped up was trumps foot fungus and let me say i was offended. my husband will only let me see his foot fungus. also it started to curse at me in some robotic voice! don’t download this app please!! 

-Melania trump
attributes.title: bad app

attributes.review: Terrible app was not able to use Bad quality did not understand what it was telling me to do please please do not download this app it is horrible I do not recommend I am so stressed out from dealing with this app that’s why I’m giving it a low review do not waste your time with this app I do not recommend do not download
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: the app is full of disrespectful people supporting a man ruining our country and our future😣! we don’t need another racist rapist controlling our country! we need a respectful leader who isn’t allies with a communist trapping muslims in camps just because he wants power?!?! absolutely horrible. we also need a president who looks at everyone’s point of view! not just racist misogynistic selfish people’s views but everyone!!!!! we also need a president who isn’t paying off debts about lying to us about his health conditions. thank you for reading but i am ready for a better app and a better president!!😁
attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.review:
My Cat 🐈 glitched so damm bad when i download this trash 🗑 app, I thought 💭 my cat 🐱 was going to die💀but when I got closer turns out my cat 🐈 turned into Bread🍞?!?!!! And after that I TURNED INTO A PIG 🐷?!?!? IM NOT A COP 🚓, then my bread cat🐱🍞thing?!?!? Started taking to me?!🤯🤯🤯🤯🤯 and it told me “the star rate it one” so I listened to my cat bread thing. One star is such a good rate! 🤪🤩🤪😳🥵😜🥶🥰😘🥳🤩😍👂🏻👁👃🏻👁👂🏻
                                                      👅
attributes.title: Cat bread 🥖🐱🤯😔👄🚓💀🥖👃🏻💭👄

attributes.review: For some reason it took sooo long for the app to download! I got in the morning but didn’t finish until late at night! Even worse once it got done it wouldn’t load! I was livid I wasted so much time for nothing. I even tried turning my phone off and back on and did the same thing!
attributes.title: Don’t waste your time!
